member.name: T:OStronghold.CharacterFolder.Character
member.summary: Class that represent a single NPC character.

member.name: M:OStronghold.CharacterFolder.Character.applyForJob(System.Int32)
member.summary: Character tries to apply for target job.
member.param: ID of the target job the character wants to apply for
member.returns: true if character successfully applied for the job. false if character failed to apply for the job.
